item.title: Katie Beth add a quote by Donald Miller
item.description: "...sometimes you have to watch somebody love something before you can love it yourself..." -- Donald Miller

item.title: Katie Beth add a quote by Donald Miller
item.description: "Believing in God is as much like falling in love as it is making a decision. Love is both something that happens to you and something you decide upon." -- Donald Miller

item.title: Katie Beth add a quote by Donald Miller
item.description: "Everybody has to leave, everybody has to leave their home and come back so they can love it again for all new reasons." -- Donald Miller

item.title: Katie Beth add a quote by Donald Miller
item.description: "When you stop expecting people to be perfect, you can like them for who they are." -- Donald Miller

item.title: Katie Beth add a quote by Donald Miller
item.description: "I could not have known then that everybody, every person, has to leave, has to change like seasons; they have to or they die. The seasons remind me that I must keep changing." -- Donald Miller

item.title: Katie Beth add a quote by Donald Miller
item.description: "The most difficult lie I have ever contended with is this: life is a story about me." -- Donald Miller

item.title: Katie Beth add a quote by Donald Miller
item.description: "I asked God to help me understand the story of the forest and what it means to be a tree in that story." -- Donald Miller

item.title: Katie Beth add a quote by Ann Patchett
item.description: "Some people are born to make great art and others are born to appreciate it. â€¦ It is a kind of talent in itself, to be an audience, whether you are the spectator in the gallery or you are listening to the voice of the world's greatest soprano. Not everyone can be the artist. There have to be those who witness the art, who love and appreciate what they have been privileged to see." -- Ann Patchett

item.title: Katie Beth add a quote by Naguib Mahfouz
item.description: "You can tell whether a man is clever by his answers. You can tell whether a man is wise by his questions." -- Naguib Mahfouz

item.title: Katie Beth add a quote by Donald Miller
item.description: "Everybody wants to be fancy and new. Nobody wants to be themselves. I mean, maybe people want to be themselves, but they want to be different, with different clothes or shorter hair or less fat. It's a fact. If there was a guy who just liked being himself and didn't want to be anybody else, that guy would be the most different guy in the world and everybody would want to be him." -- Donald Miller
